overview: A murderer, organ mafia, and a cat and mouse game surrounded by refugees from their lives on the road to freedom. Will the good and the bad lose in the Longest Night seeking answers to the question of law or justice? In the director's chair, the cast of "Longest Night", in which Orhan Kılıç sits, includes names such as Eda Erol, Cem Kılıç, Murat Aydın, Gamze Dar, Mustafa Yılmaz, Ece Müderrisoğlu, Ayça Denker, and Umut Özkan.
title: En Uzun Gece
